newsitem.title: USA: Elcom sees Q4 shr $0.07 on $174 mln revs.
newsitem.headline: Elcom sees Q4 shr $0.07 on $174 mln revs.

text.p: Elcom International Inc said Thursday it expected to exceed expectations among industry analysts for its fourth quarter earnings in reporting net income totalling about $0.07 per share on revenues of about $174 million.
The company said it planned to release its earnings at the end of the month.
First Call's consensus among analysts foresees Elcom reporting net income of $0.05 a share for the quarter ended December 31.
The company said strong sales in the corporate sector in the U.S. and British markets were mainly responsible for its higher revenues for the period.

It also said it had finalized a $100 million financing arrangement with Deutsche Financial Services Corp. The arrangement, based on eligible accounts receivable and inventory at a rate of prime minus one percent, will become available March 1, it said.
